title: Project Setup - Initialize a Source Directory

listitems.content: I know which dependencies to use for a frontend boilerplate, but I'm not sure how to setup initial files to work with.

listitems.title: Setup the Contents of a 'Source' Directory

sections.title: A Practice
sections.subTitle: Here, the beginnings of the application codebase wil be setup

listitems.title: Create A Directory
listitems.content: Inside the project, make a directory. We'll call it `src`. Webpack leverages the `src` as the default `entry point` for this type of project.

listitems.title: Create an html file
listitems.content: Inside the src directory, create an `index.html` file. This will be used as the `template` for webpack to use when building the project.

listitems.title: Create a js file
listitems.content: Inside the src directory, create an `index.js` file. This will be where react, at its core, is leveraged to manipulate the dom.

listitems.title: Create a scss file
listitems.content: Inside the src directory, create an `index.scss` file. This will be the root stylesheet for the project.
